subject: Tests and Testing
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar has toughened its drug policy and will test all drivers in its three national series before the start of the 2009 season. Nascar also said Saturday that drivers, over-the-wall crew members and officials will be subject to random tests throughout the year. Officials and licensed crew members will be tested before the start of next season.
